title: Authorization
content:
Authorization # Authorization is performed using the Authorization header with a Bearer token:
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer <TOKEN>" https://api.gadm-api.org/api/v1/geojsonl You can obtain access token programmatically

title: feature collection
content:
Feature Collection # Feature collection endpoint returns results as GeoJSON.FeatureCollection
method: GET path: /api/v1/fc/lv1 Example # curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" https://api.gadm-api.org/api/v1/fc/lv1 Query Parameters # Limiting # ?page-size Pagination # ?start-after= Filtering # ?gid-1 Limit rates #

title: geojsonl
content:
Geojsonl # This endpoint streams new line delimited GeoJSON.Features.
/api/v1/geojsonl Query Parameters # page size # ?page-size start after # ?start-after= filter # ?gid-1

title: get access token
content: Get access token # /get-access-token This endpoint streams new line delimited GeoJSON.Features.

title: reverse geocode
content:
Reverse Geocode # Returns lowest available GADM level for a given point.
Request # Request needs to inculde a point as geojson
body Response # GeoJSON.Feature | null
